actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to establish a program whereby the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development shall make payments for the purpose of assisting certain low-income homeowners in meeting increasing costs related to the operation of their homes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make payments for the purpose of assisting low-income homeowners in meeting expenses related to the operation of their homes, including insurance, mortgage, utility, and real property tax.

titles.title: A bill to establish a program whereby the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development shall make payments for the purpose of assisting certain low-income homeowners in meeting increasing costs related to the operation of their homes.
